CustomField.description:
This field is repurposed as Starter Pack, it was earlier used as Industry Key Deal - GTMS-26778
Used by Sales Directors and ISMs to label key deals. ENT = >$50K and/or a pilot w/ significant expand opportunity MM = >$30K and/or a pilot w/ significant expand opportunity; >=35% stage; defined success criteria; AEs have 2-4 each
CustomField.label: Starter Pack Opportunity
